input.content:
Filter the following raw HTML state into a clean observation. The class name and structure for each button is {Reply ("reply"), Retweet ("retweet"), Like ("like"), More ("more"): {Share via DM ("share"), Copy link to Tweet ("copy"), Embed Tweet ("embed"), Mute ("menu-user"), Block ("block-user"), Report ("report")}} State:
For the user @truman, click on the "Mute" button.
Boyd @truman...
Sabrina @adipiscing...
Observation: "@truman"=div[@data-result="0"]. Click "more" and then click "menu-user". State:
For the user @livia, click on the "Embed Tweet" button.
Afton @iaculis 8h ago
Pulvinar nulla id.
  • Share via DM
  • Copy link to Tweet
  • Embed Tweet
  • Mute @iaculis
  • Block @iaculis
  • Report
Pansy @livia 11h ago
Risus blandit sem.
  • Share via DM
  • Copy link to Tweet
  • Embed Tweet
  • Mute @livia
  • Block @livia
  • Report
Mcclain @agustina 1h ago
Quam eget.
  • Share via DM
  • Copy link to Tweet
  • Embed Tweet
  • Mute @agustina
  • Block @agustina
  • Report
Observation:

Observation:
"@truman"=div[@data-result="0"]. Click "more" and then click "menu-user".
Action:

```
agent.click_xpath("//div[@data-result='0']//span[@class='more']")  # Because share, copy, embed, menu-user, block-user, and report is in the sublist of 'more'
agent.click_xpath("//div[@data-result='0']//li[@class='menu-user']")  # Click 'menu-user' to mute the target user
```

Observation:
"@livia"=div[@data-result="1"]. Click "more" and then click "embed".
Action:

output:
```
agent.click_xpath("//div[@data-result='1']//span[@class='more']")  # Because share, copy, embed, menu-user, block-user, and report is in the sublist of 'more'
agent.click_xpath("//div[@data-result='1']//li[@class='embed']")  # Click 'embed' to get the embed code for the post
```
